pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenery shot shows a slow camera movement through a dark, hazy hallway with green-tiled walls and repeating arches. A single round light illuminates the foreground, contrasting with a brighter light at the far end of the corridor. The scene is static, with the only motion being the camera's steady advance.
